product_name: Ruff & Tuff Traveling Dog Bed - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Your furry-faced friend deserves to sleep comfortably, too! This traveling dog bed has a 1.5 in. thick, puncture resistant, self-inflating mattress with cushioned sides and a thick, soft fleece top.
short_description: Your furry-faced friend deserves to sleep comfortably, too! This traveling dog bed has a 1.5 in. thick, puncture resistant, self-inflating mattress with cushioned sides and a thick, soft fleece top.
